selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions.conditional
Class MultinomialSigmoidMix

java.lang.Object
  selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions.conditional.AbstractConditionalDistribution
      selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions.conditional.Mixture
          selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions.conditional.MultinomialSigmoidMix
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConditionalDistribution
public class MultinomialSigmoidMix
extends Mixture

This is a distribution for a discrete variable that has both discrete and continuous parents.

Author:
Charles Robertson
